channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Markiplier’s ‘Iron Lung’: Rotten Tomatoes Critics Not All Game For Horror Hit
item.description: Markiplier’s horror thriller “Iron Lung” is a big hit with movie audiences, but not so much with Rotten Tomatoes critics.

item.title: Over a million people are losing power during a freezing snowstorm while data centers nearby guzzle electricity
item.description: The terms of data center agreements with local governments and utilities often aren’t available to the public.

item.title: Short-seller claims IonQ, the biggest quantum computing company on the stock market, failed to disclose holes in its revenue
item.description: Short-seller Wolfpack Research says IonQ misled investors about cancelled government earmarks; it also points to suspicious insider stock sales.

item.title: Why Bad Bunny is essential to the future of the NFL, even if Trump hates his halftime show
item.description: Unlike the NBA, the NFL doesn't have international markets already familiar with its game to expand into.

item.title: ServiceNow Deepens AI Platform Strategy With Anthropic Partnership
item.description: Paired with its recent OpenAI partnership, the deal highlights ServiceNow’s creation of a model-agnostic architecture for building and deploying agent...

item.title: S&P rings up 5th loss in 6 days as tech stocks drag index down, led by AMD’s 17.3% drop
item.description: More than twice as many stocks rose within the S&P 500 than fell, but sinking technology stocks weighed on the index for a second straight day.

item.title: From ‘Operation Dirtbag’ to ‘Catch of the Day,’ Trump’s ICE nicknames ripped as ‘disgusting’ and ‘subhuman’
item.description: From operation "Swamp Sweep" to detention facilities like "Alligator Alcatraz," scholars say immigration operation names represent a "victory dance."

item.title: Private sector added 22,000 jobs in January, well below expectations, ADP says
item.description: The figure reported on Wednesday is below economists’ estimates of an increase of 48,000 jobs and higher than the prior month’s revised reading of a g...

item.title: Intelligence Agencies Are Drowning In Video. AI Throws A Lifeline
item.description: Video intelligence startups like Senai are helping governments process millions of social media clips that traditional OSINT tools can’t handle.

item.title: iOS 26.3 Release Date: Apple Signals iPhone Update Is Just Days Away
item.description: The next big iPhone update is almost here and the final developer and public betas reveal when it’s coming.

item.title: How Jeffrey Epstein Helped His Publicist Become A Big-Time Venture Capitalist
item.description: Masha Bucher is one of the more high profile female VCs in Silicon Valley. New emails released from the Department of Justice reveal a deep, years lon...

item.title: DOGE's Social Security data breach is a national-security risk: whistleblower
Software ate the world. Wall Street is now worried AI will eat software.
U.S. stocks close mostly lower as software rout drags down tech-heavy Nasdaq
Nasdaq sliding as software rout continues; Dow rebounding higher in final hour
Alphabet earnings: Google parent reports massive cloud growth — live coverage
Fed's Miran maintains call for aggressive interest rate cuts this year
item.description: Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran is calling for aggressive interest rate cuts exceeding one percentage point after dissenting in the latest FOMC...

item.title: China moves to ban feature commonly seen on Tesla vehicles over fear of trapped passengers
item.description: China bans electronic door handles starting 2027, requiring mechanical releases after safety incidents left passengers trapped inside vehicles.

item.title: Energy giant bets big on US, says its electricity market 'hottest' in the world
item.description: Siemens Energy announced a $1 billion investment to expand U.S. grid equipment and turbine production, citing surging power demand driven by artificia...

item.title: Here's when taxpayers will get their refunds
item.description: The IRS typically processes tax refunds within 21 days for e-filed returns, while mailed returns take six weeks or more to process during the 2025 tax...

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
